title: Congresswoman Katie Hill shouldn't have been slut-shamed out of her job because of nude photos
text:
I confess, I hadn’t heard of Democratic congresswoman Katie Hill until her the news this week that she was a victim of revenge porn and that nude photographs of her had been leaked (allegedly by her ex-partner). The pictures were posted seemingly without her consent on a website charmingly called ‘WouldYouF----MyWife’. On Sunday, as a result of that and having had an "inappropriate relationship" with a campaign staffer before taking office, Hill resigned from Congress.

Immediately, I felt a kind of kinship with her, because I, like 90 per cent of millennial women have also allowed former partners to take nude pictures of me.

The American political system is largely anathema to me. But what...
description: I confess, I hadn’t heard of Democratic congresswoman Katie Hill until her the news this week that she was a victim of revenge porn and that nude photographs of her had been leaked (allegedly by her ex-partner).
